div.p: This code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/argonaut/argo-write/CodeSystem/tags defines the following codes:

tr.td: Data is supplied by a client facing app. For example, patient generated or mediated data that is supplied by patient or other patient designee (such as a parent or spouse) rather than by a healthcare provider.

description.value: Used to tag patient submitted resources for writing and searching from EHRs

definition.value: Data is supplied by a client facing app. For example, patient generated or mediated data that is supplied by patient or other patient designee (such as a parent or spouse) rather than by a healthcare provider.
